info.title: MetahOS API
info.description:
# Overview
MetahOS API lets you interact with the MetahOS platform. In the following APIs the BaseUrl refers to the Platform-Url

For Example: demo.metahos.com/api/external/webhook

Here "demo" will be replaced by your platform subdomain
# Authentication
MetahOS API expects an username, and password. All MetahOS API calls are executed in an account's context.

example.error: Camp with camp name 'Health Camp' already exists.

200.description: Returns list of screenings with pagination.
Returns list of leads with pagination.

get.description: Get a list of details of all doctors. Optional filters like name, department, pageNo, limit can be applied.

requestBody.description: Name and mobile number should be unique

200.description: Returns success true if success and if a doctor exists with same name or phone number returns false
Returns success true if success and if a doctor exists with same name or phone number returns false
Returns success as boolean along with complete record object

post.summary: Fetch available time slots of an entity (doctor, room, etc).

200.description: successfully fetched slots and returns list of slots

get.summary: Get the details of a patient
get.description: Get the details of patient matching the uhid provided.

200.description: Returns patient list and count if success

post.description: Upload ECG report for a patient using UHID.

uhid.description: Unique Health Identifier (UHID) of the patient.

prescriptionData.diagnosis: Please see Dr. Arnav in Oncology

externalUhid.description: Identifies a patient from other platform
Identifies a patient from other platform

doctors.description: array containin objects of type doctor.

patients.description: array containin objects of type patient.

items.description: Can be any ObjectShould be Stringified JSON
